mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, USER_SEX, USER_REGDATE, USER_AGREEMENT, USER_OUT, USER_BLACK, USER_ROLE, USER_POINT FROM CON_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_BIRTH LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_SEX LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_REGDATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_AGREEMENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_OUT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_BLACK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_ROLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_POINT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM CON_USER WHERE USER_BLACK = 'Y' AND (USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT STORE_SEQ, OWNER_ID, STORE_NAME, STORE_OWNER_NAME, STORE_PATH, STORE_OWNER_NAME, STORE_PATH, STORE_SIMPLE_INTRO, STORE_INTRO, STORE_STATE, STORE_PHONE, STORE_OWNER_PHONE, STORE_ADDRESS, STORE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, STORE_TIME_OTHER, STORE_BANK, , , , FROM CON_USER WHERE STORE_SEQ LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR OWNER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_OWNER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_PATH LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_SIMPLE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_STATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_PHONE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_OWNER_PHONE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'% OR STORE_DETAIL_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_TIME_OTHER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'OR STORE_BANK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_ACCOUNT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'OR STORE_LICENSE_OWNER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR STORE_LICENSE_SALES LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'OR STORE_ADMIN_STATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
